Title: right
Description: Returns a substring of string s with a specified offset starting from the right.
s — The string to calculate a substring from. String or FixedString.offset — The number of bytes of the offset. UInt*.

For positive offset: A substring of s with offset many bytes, starting from the right of the string.For negative offset: A substring of s with length(s) - |offset| bytes, starting from the right of the string.An empty string if length is 0.
